footerText: Crafted for tranquility. Find your inner peace.

first_step.name: It Ain't Much...
first_step.description: ...but it's honest work. You've completed your first session.

mindful_hour.name: I Need a Hero
mindful_hour.description: Meditated for 1 hour. You held out for more than just a hero.

dedicated_day.name: My Precious
dedicated_day.description: 24 hours of meditation. You guard your inner peace like the One Ring.

three_day_calm.name: This is Where the Fun Begins
three_day_calm.description: A 3-day streak. Your journey into a larger world has begun.

weekly_zen.name: One Does Not Simply Miss a Day
weekly_zen.description: A 7-day streak. You've walked the path of consistency.

monthly_master.name: I Am Inevitable
monthly_master.description: A 30-day streak. Your dedication is... inevitable.
